description: [Nightdoor](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1147) embeds code from the public `al-khaser` project, a repository that works to detect virtual machines, sandboxes, and malware analysis environments.(Citation: Symantec Daggerfly 2024)

external_references.description: Threat Hunter Team. (2024, July 23). Daggerfly: Espionage Group Makes Major Update to Toolset. Retrieved July 25, 2024.
